pullrequest.title: Fix OS Specific initialization in CMakeLists.txt

content.raw: Without this fix, I am not able to configure SDFormat in CMake 3.9, due to the duplicate else in the if clause.
content.html: Without this fix, I am not able to configure SDFormat in CMake 3.9, due to the duplicate else in the if clause.

pullrequest.title: Fix OS Specific initialization in CMakeLists.txt

content.raw:
Note that in all other Gazebo/ignition projects the equivalent lines of code are (see [1] and [2]):
~~~

#################################################
# OS Specific initialization
if (UNIX)
  ign_setup_unix()
else (WIN32)
  ign_setup_windows()
endif()

if(APPLE)
  ign_setup_apple()
endif()
~~~


I avoided this version due to the mismatch in the `if(UNIX)/else(WIN32)` clause, that induces to think that the else is actually an elseif. 

[1] :https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/6dd255678a6cd736f6118a6cfbb73d825826cd3f/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-198

[2] : https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/42215f2019f5ae64fc8a0610ef804a0fc53b0740/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-258
content.html:
Note that in all other Gazebo/ignition projects the equivalent lines of code are (see [1] and [2]):

#################################################
# OS Specific initialization
if (UNIX)
  ign_setup_unix()
else (WIN32)
  ign_setup_windows()
endif()

if(APPLE)
  ign_setup_apple()
endif()

I avoided this version due to the mismatch in the if(UNIX)/else(WIN32) clause, that induces to think that the else is actually an elseif.

[1] :https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/6dd255678a6cd736f6118a6cfbb73d825826cd3f/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-198

[2] : https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/42215f2019f5ae64fc8a0610ef804a0fc53b0740/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-258

pullrequest.title: Fix OS Specific initialization in CMakeLists.txt

content.raw:
LGTM. Thanks Silvio.

Testing:

 * [OK Ubuntu Xenial](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/100/)
 * [OK Brew on Mac](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/166/)
 * Windows build is broken at this moment.
content.html:

Testing:

  • OK Ubuntu Xenial
  • OK Brew on Mac
  • Windows build is broken at this moment.
